job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Health, Wellness and Fitness,Medical Practice,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: At Lockheed Martin we are passionate about innovation and integrity We believe that by applying the highest standards of business ethics and forwardthinking everything is within our capacity  and yours as a Lockheed Martin employee Lockheed Martin values your skills training education and background Do you want to be part of an environment that encourages and supports employees to think big perform with quality and build incredible products We provide the resources inspiration and focus  if you have the resourcefulness and courage to work hard Then we want to build a better tomorrow with you Come and experience your future About our Mission As our newest team member you will participate in the development of Special Test Equipment Software used in testing Avionics hardware units In this role you will design code and integrationtest software primarily in LabVIEW and CC You will utilize strong analytical and trouble shooting skills This position will be supporting a widerange of Owego customers and contracts Candidate needs to be a selfstarter who is capable of understanding legacy LabVIEW applications and troubleshoot and make updates when necessary Basic QualificationsliBachelors degree from an accredited college in Computer Engineering or a related discipline or equivalent experiencecombined educationliExperience in LabVIEW software development Experience with C or C software development Strong analyticaldebug and SWHW and Firmware FW integration and test skillsliGood oral and written communication and interpersonal skillsliAbility to obtain a security clearance to at least the Secret level Desired SkillsliKnowledge of AnalogDigital Hardware design in the context of testing Digital Radio Frequency RF and Video HW unitsliPossess experience working with commercial test equipment including Spectrum Analyzers Power Meters Frequency Counters Oscilloscopes Multimeters Logic Analyzers etc BENEFITS OF EMPLOYMENT We may not know whats going to change the world next but chances are were already working on it and you can too As part of our culture of innovation youll have outstanding benefits and amenities an inclusive work environment ongoing career development and support rewards and recognition to honor your hard work and more HERE ARE SOME OF THE BENEFITS YOU CAN ENJOYliMedical some LM locations have onsite medicalliDentalli401k with generous matchingliPaid time off including we have a 410 Flex schedule which means every Friday offliWorklife balance familyfriendly environmentliCareer development careergrowth and lots of learning opportunities for aspiring mindsliKnowledgeable supportive and engaged leadershipliMentorship opportunitiesliRewards amp recognitionliGenerous Tuition Reimbursement Learn more about our perks coworkers We support our employees so they can support our mission BASIC QUALIFICATIONS jobQualifications Lockheed Martin is an Equal OpportunityAffirmative Action Employer All qualified applicants
